author: nero_eth
content:
As a heads-up for CL devs: [EIP-7928](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-7928.md), Block-level access lists will require minimal CL changes, namely adding `block_access_list` to the `ExecutionPayload` and adding`block_access_list_root` to the `ExecutionPayloadHeader`.

Here's the CL specs:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4526/files
Here's the Engine API specs:
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/691

For the first BAL devnet, EL clients will use Prysm (h/t <@363800010518822915>) but in the future, this will require additional changes on top of ePBS.
